CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services

Class AdminServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdminService

    @Service
public class AdminServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdminService

    Admin Service Implementation

    This Class Functions as a Service implementation which implements AdminService.class - Interface that represent All the Functions Available for a User from type - Admin.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      Create Comapny A method that receives a company validates that there is no company with the same name/email in the system and then uses the CompanyRepository.Class to save the company in the date base .
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Create Customer A method that receives a customer and validates that there is no customer with the same email in the system and then uses the CustomerRepository.Class to save the customer in the date base .
      java.util.List<Company> getAllCompanies()
      Get All Companies A method that uses the CompanyRepository.class to return a list of all the Companies are in the system from the data base .

      Get All Coupons A method that uses the CouponRepository.class to return a list of all the Coupons are in the system from the data base .
      java.util.List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Get All Customers A method that uses the CustomerRepository.class to return a list of all the Customers are in the system from the data base .
      Company getCompany(long companyId)
      Get Company A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CompanyRepository.class to return an object of the company specified from the data base .
      Coupon getCoupon(long couponId)
      Get Coupon A method that receives a couponId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CouponRepository.class to return an object of the coupon specified from the data base .
      Customer getCustomer(long customerId)
      Get Customer A method that receives a customerId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CustomerRepository.class to return an object of the customer specified from the data base .
      Admin login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, ClientType clientType)
      Company Login A method that receives Admin Login Parameters -validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the default values of admin to validate the admin details if the validation process was successful - return the object of the admin, if not - Login Exception.
      void removeCompany(long companyId)
      Remove Company A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CouponRepository.class to remove the company coupons in the data base.
      void removeCustomer(long customerId)
      Remove Customer A method that receives a customer Id validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupons from the list of purchased coupons by the customer in the data base.
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      Update Company A method that receives a company object validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CompanyRepository.class to update the company with the received new parameters (email, Password) in the data base.
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Update Customer A method that receives a customer object validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the Customerepository.class to update the customer with the received new parameters (Password) in the data base.

      • createCompany

        public void createCompany(Company company)
                   throws CouponSystemException,
                          UnFoundExecption

        Create Comapny

        A method that receives a company validates that there is no company with the same name/email in the system and then uses the CompanyRepository.Class to save the company in the date base .
        Specified by:
        createCompany in interface AdminService
        Parameters:
        company - - Company (company)
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is Already Company with same name/email in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

      • removeCompany

        public void removeCompany(long companyId)
                   throws CouponSystemException,
                          UnFoundExecption

        Remove Company

        A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
        and uses the CouponRepository.class to remove the company coupons in the data base.
        also uses the CompanyRepository.Class to remove the company itself from the data base as well as.
        Specified by:
        removeCompany in interface AdminService
        Parameters:
        companyId - - company ID (long)
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no Company with those Id's in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

        and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupons from the list of purchased coupons by the customer in the data base.
        also uses the CustomreRepository.Class to remove the customer itself in the date base as well as.

      • login

        public Admin login(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String email,
                   ClientType clientType)
            throws LoginExcecption

        Company Login

        A method that receives Admin Login Parameters -validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the default values of admin to validate the admin details if the validation process was successful - return the object of the admin, if not - Login Exception.
        Specified by:
        login in interface AdminService
        Parameters:
        name - - name (String)
        password - - password (String)
        email - - email (String)
        clientType - - clientType (ClientType.enum)
        Returns:
        Admin - Admin (object)
        Throws:
        LoginExcecption - - in case there is no admin found that matches with the giving Id's in the Data Base,Login Failed.
